title: 735: BITCOIN WILL SKYROCKET TO $5.2 MILLION PER BTC AS PRICE SOARS THROUGH 2021, PREDICTS CRYPTO EXPERTS!
description:
A panel of 50 Bitcoin and cryptocurrency experts has predicted the BTC price will continue to climb through 2021, hitting highs of around $80,000, before surging to $250,000 by 2025 and a staggering $5 million per Bitcoin by 2030.

The group, made up of crypto analysts, returned an average bitcoin price prediction of $80,021 in 2021 before ending the year at $71,415.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
